all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For of him unto whom much is given much is required; and he who sins against the greater light shall receive the greater condemnation.
Doctrine and Covenants 82:3
Quote of the Day
"Ordinations [to the Aaronic Priesthood] launch … young men into lifetimes of service."
President Steven J. Lund | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
